name: Escape From Man Cave
description:
You find yourself locked in a basement That's what you get from sneaking around!

You hope the grumpy old man living in this big white house wil not catch you. There are a lot of movie posters on the walls. There also is a big projector screen. Quite the odd man cave the old man has here...

You see an old pc in the corner of the room. Maybe the computer can unlock the door?

Note: This is the Ludum Dare 37 original version. I have made minor updates for loading the movie files (game did not work for a while) and had to update the basement textures because of lighting issues in the new version of Unity.

I might find the tima after Ludum Dare 38 to pick this up again, there is a new Videoplayer component introduced, so I might be able to use that. I have got some positive feedback which I can incorporate in the game. And there are several bugs left in this version which I want to address.
